title: Comments Analytics for NZZ with IBM Watsonx
desc: Interface for analyzing comments on NZZ articles — automatic categorization, summarization, sentiment analysis, and word cloud display, built on IBM Watsonx and supervised by IBM Zürich.
bullets: Develop a system to automatically categorize and summarize data.
Use LLMs to extract insights, including trending topics, common themes, sentiment analysis, and areas of disagreement or confusion.
Use of the IBM-s platform services like Intelligent Document Processing.

Orchestrated automated content workflows in IBM Watsonx Orchestrate by building an agent that triggered on new files in Cloud Object Storage, called Discovery/Watsonx.ai for semantic tagging and summarization, wrote results to a database, and updated article metadata.
